menu.title: Truffle Tagliatelle
menu.desc: Silky tagliatelle tossed in a creamy truffle sauce with wild mushrooms.

menu.title: Spicy Arrabbiata
menu.desc: Penne in a fiery tomato and garlic sauce, finished with fresh basil.

menu.title: Carbonara Classico
menu.desc: Authentic Roman recipe with guanciale, egg yolk, Pecorino Romano, no cream.

menu.title: Pesto Genovese
menu.desc: Fresh basil pesto over trofie pasta, garnished with pine nuts and Parmigiano.

menu.title: Lobster Linguine
menu.desc: Linguine with chunks of lobster in a garlic white wine sauce.

menu.title: Pumpkin Ravioli
menu.desc: Handmade ravioli filled with roasted pumpkin, served in sage butter sauce.

menu.title: Margherita
menu.desc: Classic Neapolitan pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

menu.title: Pepperoni Inferno
menu.desc: Loaded with spicy pepperoni, mozzarella, and a touch of chili oil.

menu.title: Quattro Formaggi
menu.desc: A rich blend of mozzarella, gorgonzola, Parmigiano, and fontina cheeses.

menu.title: Veggie Supreme
menu.desc: Topped with bell peppers, olives, onions, mushrooms, and zucchini.

menu.title: Prosciutto e Rucola
menu.desc: Thinly sliced prosciutto with fresh arugula and shaved Parmigiano.

menu.title: BBQ Chicken
menu.desc: Grilled chicken, smoky BBQ sauce, red onions, and mozzarella.

menu.title: Grilled Salmon
menu.desc: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with lemon herb butter.

menu.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
menu.desc: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and white wine sauce.

menu.title: Seafood Paella
menu.desc: Traditional Spanish rice dish with mussels, clams, shrimp, and squid.

menu.title: Lemon Pepper Calamari
menu.desc: Crispy fried calamari tossed in lemon zest and cracked black pepper.

menu.title: Tuna Tartare
menu.desc: Diced raw tuna with avocado, sesame oil, and soy-lime dressing.

menu.title: Crab Linguine
menu.desc: Linguine tossed with sweet crab meat, garlic, chili, and olive oil.

menu.title: Tiramisu
menu.desc: Classic Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

menu.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.desc: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

menu.title: Lemon Tart
menu.desc: Zesty lemon curd in a buttery shortcrust pastry, topped with powdered sugar.

menu.title: Strawberry Cheesecake
menu.desc: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and fresh strawberry topping.

menu.title: Pistachio Gelato
menu.desc: Rich and nutty pistachio gelato made with authentic Sicilian pistachios.

menu.title: Crème Brûlée
menu.desc: Silky vanilla custard with a crisp caramelized sugar top.

menu.title: Club Sandwich
menu.desc: Triple-layered sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

menu.title: Caprese Panini
menu.desc: Grilled ciabatta filled with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

menu.title: Philly Cheesesteak
menu.desc: Thinly sliced beef, sautéed onions, and melted provolone on a hoagie roll.

menu.title: Falafel Wrap
menu.desc: Crispy falafel with hummus, lettuce, tomato, and tahini sauce in a warm pita.

menu.title: Pulled Pork Sandwich
menu.desc: Slow-cooked pulled pork with BBQ sauce and coleslaw on a brioche bun.

menu.title: Eggplant Parm Sub
menu.desc: Breaded eggplant slices with marinara and melted mozzarella on a toasted sub roll.

services.title: Express Table Service
services.desc: Enjoy swift and attentive service from our trained staff, ensuring a seamless dining experience.

services.title: Farm-to-Table Ingredients
services.desc: We partner with local farms to bring you fresh, organic produce in every dish.

services.title: Gourmet Chef Specials
services.desc: Indulge in exclusive creations from our award-winning chefs, updated weekly.

services.title: Live Music Nights
services.desc: Join us every weekend for live performances that elevate your dining experience.

comments.body: Every dish was a masterpiece. The flavors were bold, balanced, and beautifully presented.
The ambiance was warm and inviting, and the staff made us feel right at home.
I can’t stop thinking about the truffle risotto—creamy, rich, and absolutely divine.
From starters to dessert, everything was top-notch. The grilled octopus was a standout!
Perfect spot for a romantic evening. Candlelit tables, soft music, and exquisite cuisine.
Service was attentive without being intrusive. I’ll definitely be recommending this place!

messages.subject: Inquiry about delivery times
messages.body: Hi, I placed an order yesterday and was wondering how long it usually takes to arrive in Madrid. Thanks!

messages.subject: Issue with payment
messages.body: Hello, I tried to pay with my card but it keeps getting declined. Can you help me resolve this?

messages.subject: Feedback on your espresso
messages.body: Just wanted to say your espresso is phenomenal. Rich, smooth, and exactly what I needed this morning!

messages.subject: Request for invoice
messages.body: Could you please send me the invoice for my last order? I need it for my records.

messages.subject: Suggestion for new flavors
messages.body: Have you considered adding hazelnut or coconut to your menu? I think they'd be a hit!

messages.subject: Loved the Black Coffee!
messages.body: Just wanted to say thank you—the Black Coffee was perfect. I’ll definitely be ordering again soon.

messages.subject: your address
messages.body: I am not sure about your address and I have reserved a table but still not sure please call me and make me now
